attributes.action: For a TV Debate on the concrete outcomes of Last Minute/No Deal Brexit vs Remain
attributes.additional_details:
We need our Leaders to put Country before Politics. 
People of Britain are weary of the political games being played out in Westminster and the EU.
We deserve the honest truth from our elected leaders to know what we are facing from 1 November and beyond.
attributes.background: Factual information of the repercussions of Brexit revealed since the 2016 Referendum imply a much worse outcome for Britain & NI than was previously outlined. MPs must come clean with the concrete facts of the the impact on our families, our industry, our Health Service and our global position.
